short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: online text tools, including json formmater, text diff, url encoding & etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool which temporarily support json formatter, code diff, text diff, text edit, url encode, url decode, url params extrator, regex etc. And this tool will help you format json automaticly when you visit json in chrome (like json formatter). wish you enjoy it ~
